## 0 - Setup

```{r} 

if (!require("pacman")) 
  install.packages("pacman")

# use this line for installing/loading
#pacman::p_load() 

devtools::install_github("tidyverse/dsbox")
```

## 1 - Road traffic accidents in Edinburgh

1) get basic dataset: 
```{r label-me-1}
#inspect the document
??accidents
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
accident<-dsbox::accidents
accident
```
2) start plot 
```{r}

#find color website: https://imagecolorpicker.com/en
accident_noFatal <- accident %>% filter(severity != "Fatal")

time_plot<-ggplot(accident_noFatal, aes(x = time, fill = severity)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.7) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Fatal" = "#a993b0", "Serious" = "#9ec9c7", "Slight" = "#fef39f"))+ xlab("Time of day") + 
  ggtitle("weekend")
time_plot



```
